name: Halls + Walls gallery 2020 - Sculpture
description:
Works best on Google Chrome https://www.google.com/chrome/

Navigate with your  W A S D keys. Use your mouse to look around. Press space bar + 'w' key to jump forward if you're having trouble getting up the stairs. Press ESC to regain control of mouse.

An exhibition of artwork made by fall 2020 advanced sculpture and installation students. 

For more information about the student artwork, see: https://www.hallsandwallsgal.com

Made by the Halls and Walls Club with faculty oversight by Katy McCarthy
